column3: Welsh text
Cyn i chi ddechrau

column2: Use this service to submit your Alcohol Duty Return for [start date] to [end date].
column3: Defnyddiwch y gwasanaeth hwn i gyflwyno’ch Datganiad Toll Alcohol ar gyfer [start date] i [end date].

column2: You need to tell us about any alcoholic products for duty in this period. When declaring you will need to tell us the total litres of alcoholic product and the litres of pure alcohol across a range of ABV bands.
column3: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am unrhyw gynhyrchion alcoholaidd at ddiben toll yn ystod y cyfnod hwn. Wrth ddatgan, bydd angen i chi roi gwybod i ni beth yw cyfanswm y litrau o gynnyrch alcoholaidd a’r litrau o alcohol pur ar draws ystod o fandiau ABV (alcohol yn ôl cyfaint).

column2: You can also use this service to tell us about:
column3: Gallwch hefyd ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn i roi gwybod i ni am y canlynol:

column2: alcoholic products not declared in an earlier return
column3: cynhyrchion alcoholaidd na chafodd eu datgan mewn Datganiad cynharach

column2: alcoholic products over-declared in an earlier return
column3: cynhyrchion alcoholaidd a gafodd eu gorddatgan mewn Datganiad cynharach
cynhyrchion alcoholaidd sydd wedi’u difetha
cynhyrchion alcoholaidd o’r gasgen sydd wedi’u hailbecynnu

column2: alcoholic products you have exported and need to claim drawback on
column3: cynhyrchion alcoholaidd rydych chi wedi’u hallforio ac y mae angen i chi hawlio ad-daliad ar eu cyfer

column2: The deadline for completing this return [is] [due date/today]
column3: Y dyddiad cau ar gyfer cwblhau’r Datganiad hwn [yw] [due date/heddiw]
column4: We have assumed that "today" will appear as a word rather than a date, so we have translated it into Welsh. If our assumption is incorrect, then please change "/heddiw" to "/today".

column2: The deadline for completing this return [was] [due date]
column3: Y dyddiad cau ar gyfer cwblhau’r Datganiad hwn [oedd] [due date]
Parhau
Cwblhau’ch Datganiad Toll Alcohol

column2: This is your alcohol return for the period [start date] to [end date].
column3: Dyma’ch Datganiad Toll Alcohol ar gyfer y cyfnod [start date] i [end date].

column2: Complete all the tasks and send this return on or before [due date].
column3: Cwblhewch yr holl dasgau ac anfonwch y Datganiad hwn ar neu cyn [due date].

column2: We will save your answers until [d mmmm yyyy].
column3: Byddwn yn cadw’ch atebion tan [d mmmm yyyy].
Heb ddechrau hyd yn hyn
Ar y gweill
Wedi cwblhau
Methu dechrau
Datgan cynhyrchion alcoholaidd at ddiben toll

column2: Tell us if you have alcoholic products to declare
column3: Rhoi gwybod i ni a oes gennych gynhyrchion alcoholaidd i’w datgan
Datgan cwrw
Datgan seidr
Datgan gwin
Datgan cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill
Datgan gwirodydd
Datgan addasiadau o Ddatganiadau blaenorol

column2: Tell us if you have adjustments to declare
column3: Rhoi gwybod i ni a oes gennych addasiadau i’w datgan
Datgan addasiadau

column2: Tell us why products were under-declared
column3: Rhoi gwybod i ni pam y cafodd cynhyrchion eu tanddatgan

column2: Tell us why products were over-declared
column3: Rhoi gwybod i ni pam y cafodd cynhyrchion eu gorddatgan
Rhoi gwybod am ddosbarthiadau o alcohol y gohiriwyd tollau arno

column2: Tell if you have delivered or received finished products in duty suspense
column3: Rhoi gwybod i ni a ydych wedi dosbarthu neu dderbyn cynhyrchion gorffenedig o dan ohiriad tollau
column4: We have translated "Tell if" as "Tell us if". However, please let us know if the intended meaning was "How to know if…".

column2: Change the entries you've told us about
column3: Newid y cofnodion rydych chi wedi rhoi gwybod i ni amdanynt
column4: We have interpreted "entries" as entries in a record, but please let us know if it refers to things entering the UK.

column3: Rhoi gwybod am waith cynhyrchu gwirodydd

column2: Tell us about spirits produced in the past three months
column3: Rhoi gwybod i ni am wirodydd a gynhyrchwyd yn ystod y tri mis diwethaf
Anfon Datganiad

column2: Check duty payable and send your return
column3: Gwirio’r doll sy’n daladwy ac anfon eich Datganiad
Cwblhewch bob tasg
